Game Summary

Two years after the release of Gothic 3, once again journey
to the world of Myrtana for an all new experience set in this
amazingly rendered universe. Forsaken Gods includes more than
125 all new quests to explore, dozens of new monsters to slay,
20 new weapons and armour sets and many old friends to revisit.
Gothic 3: Forsaken Gods will answer all the questions which have
risen in the past, while introducing you to an exciting new chapter.

4. Play
